Articles.Content: I'm running the latest version of KSP on linux along with BDArmory and the required module manager and physics range extender. When I play with the mod in game (such as dropping bombs or launching missiles), they just bounce harmlessly off the ground without exploding. This also happens when anything else hits the ground, whether it is debris or an entire plane; they bounce of the ground with no damage or explosions. I'm pretty sure I installed the mods correctly, putting the BD Armory, physics range extender, and the module manager files/folders all inside the gamedata folder. Nothing else seems wrong with the game except for that. Any suggestions for a fix?

What version of bdac are you using?

Check for a gamedata folder in a gamedata folder.

BUT, linux MIGHT b e a problem.

@cinnaman00001 - Disregard the above users post as they do not know what they think they know

Now for a real soution ......

Please consult the in game KSPedia for detailed instructions on the operation of BDAc

If you experience this issue after reading the instryctuin manual then please co sult the first post of the BDAc thread where you will learn how to help us (the BDAc team) help you
